title: Ticket #7009: DAGMan event log messed up when job has no event log
description:
When a job that's part of a DAG doesn't request a user event log and there's no global EVENT_LOG, the schedd and company treat the dagman event log as if it were the user event log. This has two significant effects:

  • The DAGManNodesMask attribute is ignored (i.e. all job events are written).
  • Events will be written in XML if use_xml=true is set in the submit file.
remarks:
2020-Dec-10 13:26:56 by jfrey:
This problem was fixed as part of #5329.
